data.title: Manim Community
data.description: Manim is a community-maintained Python library for creating mathematical animations.
data.content:
Manim Community
=============== 

[![Image 1: Manim Community Logo](https://www.manim.community/logo.svg)](https://www.manim.community/)

*   [Docs](https://docs.manim.community/)
*   [Github](https://github.com/ManimCommunity/manim)
*   [Try Manim Online](https://try.manim.community/)
*   [Made with Manim](https://www.manim.community/awesome)

A community maintained Python library for creating mathematical animations.

[Star on Github](https://github.com/manimCommunity/manim)[Getting Started](https://docs.manim.community/en/stable/tutorials/quickstart.html)

Install Manim

![Image 2: Windows](https://www.manim.community/windows.svg)

[Install on Windows](https://docs.manim.community/en/stable/installation/windows.html)

![Image 3: Tux](https://www.manim.community/tux.svg)

[Install on Linux](https://docs.manim.community/en/stable/installation/linux.html)

![Image 4: macOS Logo](https://www.manim.community/macos.svg)

[Install on macOS](https://docs.manim.community/en/stable/installation/macos.html)

Examples
--------

```python
class ContinuousMotion(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        func = lambda pos: np.sin(pos[0] / 2) * UR + np.cos(pos[1] / 2) * LEFT
        stream_lines = StreamLines(func, stroke_width=2, max_anchors_per_line=30)
        self.add(stream_lines)
        stream_lines.start_animation(warm_up=False, flow_speed=1.5)
        self.wait(stream_lines.virtual_time / stream_lines.flow_speed)
```

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Here is a [link to the video](https://www.manim.community/examples/ContinuousMotion.mp4) instead.

```python
class OpeningManim(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        title = Tex(r"This is some \LaTeX")
        basel = MathTex(r"\sum_{n=1}^\infty \frac{1}{n^2} = \frac{\pi^2}{6}")
        VGroup(title, basel).arrange(DOWN)
        self.play(
            Write(title),
            FadeIn(basel, shift=DOWN),
        )
        self.wait()

        transform_title = Tex("That was a transform")
        transform_title.to_corner(UP + LEFT)
        self.play(
            Transform(title, transform_title),
            LaggedStart(*(FadeOut(obj, shift=DOWN) for obj in basel)),
        )
        self.wait()

        grid = NumberPlane()
        grid_title = Tex("This is a grid", font_size=72)
        grid_title.move_to(transform_title)

        self.add(grid, grid_title)  # Make sure title is on top of grid
        self.play(
            FadeOut(title),
            FadeIn(grid_title, shift=UP),
            Create(grid, run_time=3, lag_ratio=0.1),
        )
        self.wait()

        grid_transform_title = Tex(
            r"That was a non-linear function \\ applied to the grid",
        )
        grid_transform_title.move_to(grid_title, UL)
        grid.prepare_for_nonlinear_transform()
        self.play(
            grid.animate.apply_function(
                lambda p: p
                + np.array(
                    [
                        np.sin(p[1]),
                        np.sin(p[0]),
                        0,
                    ],
                ),
            ),
            run_time=3,
        )
        self.wait()
        self.play(Transform(grid_title, grid_transform_title))
        self.wait()
```

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Here is a [link to the video](https://www.manim.community/examples/OpeningManim.mp4) instead.

```python
class SquareToCircle(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        circle = Circle()
        square = Square()
        square.flip(RIGHT)
        square.rotate(-3 * TAU / 8)
        circle.set_fill(PINK, opacity=0.5)

        self.play(Create(square))
        self.play(Transform(square, circle))
        self.play(FadeOut(square))
```

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Here is a [link to the video](https://www.manim.community/examples/SquareToCircle.mp4) instead.

```python
class UnionExample(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        sq = Square(color=RED, fill_opacity=1).move_to([-2, 0, 0])
        cr = Circle(color=BLUE, fill_opacity=1).move_to([-1.3, 0.7, 0])
        un = Union(sq, cr, color=GREEN, fill_opacity=1).move_to([1.5, 0.3, 0])
        self.add(sq, cr, un)
```

![Image 5](https://www.manim.community/examples/UnionExample.png)

```python
class WarpSquare(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        square = Square()
        self.play(
            ApplyPointwiseFunction(
                lambda point: complex_to_R3(np.exp(R3_to_complex(point))),
                square,
            ),
        )
        self.wait()
```

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Here is a [link to the video](https://www.manim.community/examples/WarpSquare.mp4) instead.

Another Example

Made With Manim
---------------

[More Made With Manim](https://www.manim.community/awesome/)

Free and Open Source
--------------------

Manim is a free and open-source project originally written by Grant Sanderson. It is now maintained by the Manim Community and permissively released under the MIT license.

[Contribute to Manim](https://docs.manim.community/en/stable/contributing.html)

Our Sponsors
